title: 1999/19/EC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1998 amending for the eighth time Decision 95/32/EC approving the Austrian programme for the implementation of Article 138 of the Act concerning the conditions of accession of the Republic of Austria, the Republic of Finland and the Kingdom of Sweden (notified under document number C(1998) 4363) (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 December 1998 amending for the eighth time Decision 95/32/EC approving the Austrian programme for the implementation of Article 138 of the Act concerning the conditions of accession of the Republic of Austria, the Republic of Finland and the Kingdom of Sweden (notified under document number C(1998) 4363) (Only the German text is authentic) (1999/19/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Decision 95/32/EC, the rows which concern the categories 'fattening pigs`, 'sows` and 'sows undergoing performance testing` are replaced by the following rows:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Austria.
